entry.title: pythonfirst
entry.content:
print

句尾无需分号，点击运行后才会运行

input

赋值

input

字符串与变量之间用加号连接

数据类型

str()，int()，float()，type()，len()

str

字符串的呈现方式一般是用单引号或者双引号括起来的文本

【转义字符\】

打印结果为 Let’s go
otherweise


otherweise

转义字符【 】

它的作用是换行


type()

运行结果为

len()

运行结果为 3

str() int() 字符转换

if

注意：


if,elif 以及else 后要加英文冒号。
if 后的执行语句要空4格
entry.summary: print

entry.title: PCA
entry.content:
2D

先通过x,y的平均值找出所有点的中心点，再将此平均值移到原点。

再画一条经过原点的线，旋转，直到所有点到这条线的距离的平方和最短，也就是点映射到线上的点到原点的距离最长。记为sum of the squard distance(SS1),这条线即为PC1。

垂直于PC1有条线为PC2。(SS2)

variation(PC1)=SS1/(n-1);
variation(PC2)=SS2/(n-1);
weighting(PC1)=variation(PC1)/(variation(PC1)+variation(PC2));
weighting(PC2)=variation(PC2)/(variation(PC1)+variation(PC2));

3D

当weighting(PC1)+weighting(PC2)>90%,

可以忽略PC3

–> 降维

entry.title: Hough Transform
entry.content:
Hough transform algorithm

Algorithm for localisation and extraction of an
analytically describable structure.
1） Subdivide the feature domain into cells (bins), i.e.
rasterisation. Each bin represents a set of value
combinations of the feature domain.
2） For each bin an accumulator is defined, and the
entry is initialised with 0 respectively.
3） For each gray-level edge point of the image, there is
a set of value combinations in the feature domain
which satisfy the equation of the analytic form.
Each accumulator, which contains at least one value
combination from this set, will be increased by 1.
4） Find the maximum bin entry in the accumulator
array (synonym: find maximum value in this
so-called Hough image).

matlab show

<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC “-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN”>

CRV_WS1718_11_MyHough

CRV_WS1718_11_MyHough

name: Yike Li Student Number: 3025950

Contents

  • clean up
  • edge01
  • edge02

clean up

clear all;
close all;
clc;

edge01

I1=imread(‘edge01.png’);
I1=double(I1);
BW1=im2bw(I1);
edge1=edge(BW1);

[ akku1, h1, alpha1 ] = MyHough( edge1 );

figure,subplot(121),imshow(edge1),title(‘edge image’);
hold on;

ak1=akku1;
N1=20;
peaks1=[];
for i=1:N1
peaks1(i)=max(max(ak1));
[x1,y1]=find(ak1==peaks1(i));
n1=length(x1);
for j=1:n1
alphamax1=alpha1(y1(j));
hmax1=h1(x1(j));
fimplicit(@(y,x) round(x.cos(deg2rad(alphamax1))+y.sin(deg2rad(alphamax1))-hmax1),…
‘gx-‘,‘LineWidth’,2);
end
ak1(x1,y1)=0;
end

hold off;
subplot(122),imshow(akku1,[]),title(‘Hough image’);

edge02

I2=imread(‘edge02.png’);
I2=double(I2);
BW2=im2bw(I2);
edge2=edge(I2);
[ akku2, h2, alpha2 ] = MyHough( edge2 );
figure,subplot(121),imshow(edge2),title(‘edge image’);
hold on;
ak2=akku2;
N2=6;
peaks2=[];
for i=1:N2
peaks2(i)=max(max(ak2));
[x2,y2]=find(ak2==peaks2(i));
n2=length(x2);
for j=1:n2
alphamax2=alpha2(y2(j));
hmax2=h2(x2(j));
fimplicit(@(y,x) round(x.cos(deg2rad(alphamax2))+y.sin(deg2rad(alphamax2))-hmax2),…
   ‘gx-‘,‘LineWidth’,2);
end
ak2(x2,y2)=0;
end
hold off;
subplot(122),imshow(akku2,[]),title(‘Hough image’);
%peaks2=max(max(akku2));
%[x2,y2]=find(akku2==peaks2);
%alphamax2=alpha2(y2);
%hmax2=h2(x2);
%fimplicit(@(y,x)round(x.cos(deg2rad(alphamax2))+y.sin(deg2rad(alphamax2))-hmax2),…
 %  ‘gx–’ ,’LineWidth’,4);
%hold off;


Published with MATLAB® R2018a

<!–

SOURCE BEGIN

%% CRV_WS1718_11_MyHough

%% clean up
clear all;
close all;
clc;

%% edge01
I1=imread(‘edge01.png’);
I1=double(I1);
BW1=im2bw(I1);
edge1=edge(BW1);

[ akku1, h1, alpha1 ] = MyHough( edge1 );

figure,subplot(121),imshow(edge1),title(‘edge image’);
hold on;

ak1=akku1;
N1=20;
peaks1=[];
for i=1:N1
peaks1(i)=max(max(ak1));
[x1,y1]=find(ak1==peaks1(i));
n1=length(x1);
for j=1:n1
alphamax1=alpha1(y1(j));
hmax1=h1(x1(j));
fimplicit(@(y,x) round(x.cos(deg2rad(alphamax1))+y.sin(deg2rad(alphamax1))-hmax1),…
‘gx-‘,’LineWidth’,2);
end
ak1(x1,y1)=0;
end

hold off;
subplot(122),imshow(akku1,[]),title(‘Hough image’);

%% edge02

I2=imread(‘edge02.png’);
I2=double(I2);
BW2=im2bw(I2);
edge2=edge(I2);

[ akku2, h2, alpha2 ] = MyHough( edge2 );

figure,subplot(121),imshow(edge2),title(‘edge image’);
hold on;
ak2=akku2;
N2=6;
peaks2=[];

for i=1:N2
peaks2(i)=max(max(ak2));
[x2,y2]=find(ak2==peaks2(i));
n2=length(x2);
for j=1:n2
alphamax2=alpha2(y2(j));
hmax2=h2(x2(j));
fimplicit(@(y,x) round(x.cos(deg2rad(alphamax2))+y.sin(deg2rad(alphamax2))-hmax2),…
‘gx-‘,’LineWidth’,2);
end
ak2(x2,y2)=0;
end
hold off;
subplot(122),imshow(akku2,[]),title(‘Hough image’);
%%
%peaks2=max(max(akku2));
%[x2,y2]=find(akku2==peaks2);
%alphamax2=alpha2(y2);
%hmax2=h2(x2);
%fimplicit(@(y,x)round(x.cos(deg2rad(alphamax2))+y.sin(deg2rad(alphamax2))-hmax2),…
% ‘gxREPLACE_WITH_DASH_DASH’ ,’LineWidth’,4);

%hold off;

SOURCE END

–>
entry.summary: Hough trans

entry.title: image edge detection
entry.content:
matlab show

<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC “-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN”>

CRV_07_EdgeDetection

CRV_07_EdgeDetection

name : Shuting Yang student number : 3056393

Contents

  • clean up
  • Gray-scale image
  • SimpleDerivation
  • Prewitt
  • Sobel
  • edge

clean up

clear all;
close all;
clc;

Gray-scale image

Cameraman = imread(‘cameraman.tif’);
Cameraman = medfilt2(Cameraman);
Cameraman2=Cameraman/255;

SimpleDerivation

fopgrx = -1:1;
fopgry =fopgrx’;
Grxim=myCorrelation(Cameraman2,fopgrx);
Gryim=myCorrelation(Cameraman2,fopgry);
% Grxim=double(imfilter(Cameraman2,fopgrx));
% Gryim=double(imfilter(Cameraman2,fopgry));
MoGxy=sqrt(Grxim.^2+Gryim.^2);
v1=0.5;
[row1 col1]=size(MoGxy);
for i=1:row1
    for j=1:col1
        if MoGxy(i,j)>v1
           fimedge1(i,j)=1;
        else
           fimedge1(i,j)=0;
        end
    end
end
v2=1.5;
for i=1:row1
    for j=1:col1
        if MoGxy(i,j)>v2
           fimedge2(i,j)=1;
        else
           fimedge2(i,j)=0;
        end
    end
end
figure;
subplot(2,3,1);
imshow(Cameraman);
title (‘original’);
subplot(2,3,2);
imshow(Grxim);
title (‘Grxim’);
subplot(2,3,3);
imshow(Gryim);
title (‘Gryim’);
subplot(2,3,4);
imshow(MoGxy);
title (‘MoGxy’);
subplot(2,3,5);
imshow(fimedge1);
title (‘threshold=0.5’);
subplot(2,3,6);
imshow(fimedge2);
title (‘threshold=1.5’);

Prewitt

prewitt=[-1 0 1;-1 0 1;-1 0 1];
prewittxim=double(imfilter(Cameraman2,prewitt));
prewittyim=double(imfilter(Cameraman2,prewitt’));
Moprewitt=sqrt(prewittxim.^2+prewittyim.^2);
v1=0.5;
[row2 col2]=size(Moprewitt);
for i=1:row2
    for j=1:col2
        if Moprewitt(i,j)>v1
           fimedge3(i,j)=1;
        else
           fimedge3(i,j)=0;
        end
    end
end
v2=1.5;
for i=1:row2
    for j=1:col2
        if Moprewitt(i,j)>v2
           fimedge4(i,j)=1;
        else
           fimedge4(i,j)=0;
        end
    end
end
figure;
subplot(2,3,1);
imshow(Cameraman);
title (‘original’);
subplot(2,3,2);
imshow(prewittxim);
title (‘prewittxim’);
subplot(2,3,3);
imshow(prewittyim);
title (‘prewittyim’);
subplot(2,3,4);
imshow(Moprewitt);
title (‘Moprewitt’);
subplot(2,3,5);
imshow(fimedge3);
title (‘threshold=0.5’);
subplot(2,3,6);
imshow(fimedge4);
title (‘threshold=1.5’);

Sobel

Sobel=[-1 0 1;-2 0 2;-1 0 1];
Sobelxim=double(imfilter(Cameraman2,Sobel));
Sobelyim=double(imfilter(Cameraman2,Sobel’));
MoSobel=sqrt(Sobelxim.^2+Sobelyim.^2);
v1=0.5;
[row3 col3]=size(MoSobel);
for i=1:row3
    for j=1:col3
        if MoSobel(i,j)>v1
           fimedge5(i,j)=1;
        else
           fimedge5(i,j)=0;
        end
    end
end
v3=1.2;
for i=1:row3
    for j=1:col3
        if MoSobel(i,j)>v3
           fimedge6(i,j)=1;
        else
           fimedge6(i,j)=0;
        end
    end
end
figure;
subplot(2,3,1);
imshow(Cameraman);
title (‘original’);
subplot(2,3,2);
imshow(Sobelxim);
title (‘Sobelxim’);
subplot(2,3,3);
imshow(Sobelyim);
title (‘Sobelyim’);
subplot(2,3,4);
imshow(MoSobel);
title (‘MoSobel’);
subplot(2,3,5);
imshow(fimedge5);
title (‘threshold=0.5’);
subplot(2,3,6);
imshow(fimedge6);
title (‘threshold=1.2’);

edge

figure;
subplot(2,2,1);
imshow(Cameraman);
title(‘original’);
BWPrewitt = edge(Cameraman,‘Prewitt’);
subplot(2,2,2);
imshow(BWPrewitt);
title(‘Prewitt’);
BWSobel = edge(Cameraman,‘Sobel’);
subplot(2,2,3);
imshow(BWSobel);
title(‘Sobel’);
BWCanny = edge(Cameraman,‘Canny’);
subplot(2,2,4);
imshow(BWCanny);
title(‘Canny’);


Published with MATLAB® R2018a

<!–

SOURCE BEGIN

%% CRV_07_EdgeDetection
% name : Shuting Yang
% student number : 3056393

%% clean up
clear all;
close all;
clc;

%% Gray-scale image
Cameraman = imread(‘cameraman.tif’);
Cameraman = medfilt2(Cameraman);
Cameraman2=Cameraman/255;

%% SimpleDerivation
fopgrx = -1:1;
fopgry =fopgrx’;
Grxim=myCorrelation(Cameraman2,fopgrx);
Gryim=myCorrelation(Cameraman2,fopgry);
% Grxim=double(imfilter(Cameraman2,fopgrx));
% Gryim=double(imfilter(Cameraman2,fopgry));
MoGxy=sqrt(Grxim.^2+Gryim.^2);
v1=0.5;
[row1 col1]=size(MoGxy);
for i=1:row1
for j=1:col1
if MoGxy(i,j)>v1
fimedge1(i,j)=1;
else
fimedge1(i,j)=0;
end
end
end
v2=1.5;
for i=1:row1
for j=1:col1
if MoGxy(i,j)>v2
fimedge2(i,j)=1;
else
fimedge2(i,j)=0;
end
end
end
figure;
subplot(2,3,1);
imshow(Cameraman);
title (‘original’);
subplot(2,3,2);
imshow(Grxim);
title (‘Grxim’);
subplot(2,3,3);
imshow(Gryim);
title (‘Gryim’);
subplot(2,3,4);
imshow(MoGxy);
title (‘MoGxy’);
subplot(2,3,5);
imshow(fimedge1);
title (‘threshold=0.5’);
subplot(2,3,6);
imshow(fimedge2);
title (‘threshold=1.5’);
%% Prewitt
prewitt=[-1 0 1;-1 0 1;-1 0 1];
prewittxim=double(imfilter(Cameraman2,prewitt));
prewittyim=double(imfilter(Cameraman2,prewitt’));
Moprewitt=sqrt(prewittxim.^2+prewittyim.^2);
v1=0.5;
[row2 col2]=size(Moprewitt);
for i=1:row2
for j=1:col2
if Moprewitt(i,j)>v1
fimedge3(i,j)=1;
else
fimedge3(i,j)=0;
end
end
end
v2=1.5;
for i=1:row2
for j=1:col2
if Moprewitt(i,j)>v2
fimedge4(i,j)=1;
else
fimedge4(i,j)=0;
end
end
end
figure;
subplot(2,3,1);
imshow(Cameraman);
title (‘original’);
subplot(2,3,2);
imshow(prewittxim);
title (‘prewittxim’);
subplot(2,3,3);
imshow(prewittyim);
title (‘prewittyim’);
subplot(2,3,4);
imshow(Moprewitt);
title (‘Moprewitt’);
subplot(2,3,5);
imshow(fimedge3);
title (‘threshold=0.5’);
subplot(2,3,6);
imshow(fimedge4);
title (‘threshold=1.5’);
%% Sobel
Sobel=[-1 0 1;-2 0 2;-1 0 1];
Sobelxim=double(imfilter(Cameraman2,Sobel));
Sobelyim=double(imfilter(Cameraman2,Sobel’));
MoSobel=sqrt(Sobelxim.^2+Sobelyim.^2);
v1=0.5;
[row3 col3]=size(MoSobel);
for i=1:row3
for j=1:col3
if MoSobel(i,j)>v1
fimedge5(i,j)=1;
else
fimedge5(i,j)=0;
end
end
end
v3=1.2;
for i=1:row3
for j=1:col3
if MoSobel(i,j)>v3
fimedge6(i,j)=1;
else
fimedge6(i,j)=0;
end
end
end
figure;
subplot(2,3,1);
imshow(Cameraman);
title (‘original’);
subplot(2,3,2);
imshow(Sobelxim);
title (‘Sobelxim’);
subplot(2,3,3);
imshow(Sobelyim);
title (‘Sobelyim’);
subplot(2,3,4);
imshow(MoSobel);
title (‘MoSobel’);
subplot(2,3,5);
imshow(fimedge5);
title (‘threshold=0.5’);
subplot(2,3,6);
imshow(fimedge6);
title (‘threshold=1.2’);
%% edge
figure;
subplot(2,2,1);
imshow(Cameraman);
title(‘original’);
BWPrewitt = edge(Cameraman,’Prewitt’);
subplot(2,2,2);
imshow(BWPrewitt);
title(‘Prewitt’);
BWSobel = edge(Cameraman,’Sobel’);
subplot(2,2,3);
imshow(BWSobel);
title(‘Sobel’);
BWCanny = edge(Cameraman,’Canny’);
subplot(2,2,4);
imshow(BWCanny);
title(‘Canny’);

SOURCE END

–>

entry.title: Understanding for Interview
entry.content:
介绍自己专业所学

故障诊断可分为机器故障和系统算法故障，可上可下。
软件matlab,c,python
机器学习，视觉感知，edge detection
大数据分析，建模。

介绍自己所做的praktikum

了解所要申请的公司及岗位，对应其需求

e.g. 三水箱系统可以控制液面以及流速，应用到汽车行业，则可以应用到油箱

趋利避害

基础算法可应用到各个领域。
学习能力才是最重要的。
